;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;--------------------------------------------- CHARACTER TRAIT DATA - EBII 2014.01 ---------------------------------------------
;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;																																-
;			This file is entirely composed by hand - errors and bugs are to be expected.										-
;																																-
;	TABLE OF CONTENTS																											-
;	Section 1.0 - Primary Traits			- traits for all family members acquired upon game-entry							-
;	Section 2.0 - Ethnicity Traits			- ethnicities, all family members should have one									-
;	Section 3.0 - Secondary Traits			- widely shared traits																-
;	Section 4.0 - Faction Specific Traits	- special, faction-specific mechanisms and foreign-language traits					-
;	Section 5.0 - Agent Traits				- traits related to agents: diplomats, spies, assassins, admirals					-
;	Section 6.0 - Ancillary Traits			- traits related to the acquisition of ancillaries									-
;	Section 7.0 - Religion Traits			- religion-related traits, temple-based, generated from JMRCÂ´s spreadsheet			-
;	Section 8.0 - Strabo Traits				- traits that drop historical information message upon conquest						-
;	Section 9.0 - Game Mechanics traits		- royal family, loyalty, seasons, biographies, ageing, miscellaneous				-
;	Section 10.0 - Orphaned Traits			- traits that were removed, but might be referenced by other files, no triggers		-
;																																-
;																																-
;NOTE-Avoid using anti-traits if possible as they do not work in M2TW															-
;Instead you should create extra triggers to assign negative points to a trait or set an appropriate < 1 condition				-
;This acts as a surrogate antitrait																								-
;Please visit the scripting section of the M2TW mod workshop on twcenter for further info via a stickied thread					-
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------	-
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
; Section 1.0 - Primary Traits
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Heriskozez, who have the Deer/Stag as a tribe totem, are a numerous people, who are known for their honest dealings and diplomatic skill with other tribes. ; o Aristocratic/Independent/Adventurer - This man has aristocratic feelings toward rule, having more confidence in a band of counselors than in the whims of one man. ; o Aristocratic/Uniter/Adventurer - This man has aristocratic feelings toward rule, having more confidence in a band of counselors than in the whims of one man. He feels that his own safety and prosperity are better assured in united action and common administration. He has an adventurous spirit, abides risk, and dreams of pioneering distant lands.

Trigger TrulyAlive
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

    Condition TrueCondition    ; not sure about this one, really doesn't need any additional condition

    Affects FactionAlive  1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger AlreadyAlive    ; gives trait to all starting faction leaders
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and Trait FactionAlive < 1

    Affects FactionAlive  1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
; Section 1.0a - Trait assignation to starting under-age characters
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Trigger PtolemaiosEuergetes_ComesOfAge
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait PhiladelphosPtolemaiosBiography = 1
          and I_TurnNumber > 8
          and I_TurnNumber < 20

    Affects NaturalIntelligence  1  Chance  100
    Affects NaturalCharisma  1  Chance  100
    Affects Selflessness  1  Chance  100
    Affects LoyaltyLevel  1  Chance  100
    Affects PtolemaioiLagides  1  Chance  100
    Affects EthnoDetermined  1  Chance  100
    Affects PtolemaiosEuergetesBiography  1  Chance  100
    Affects KindRuler  4  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Roman_Patrician_married_into_family
    WhenToTest OfferedForMarriage

    Condition FactionType f_rome
          and Trait Patrician < 1
          and Trait Plebeian < 1

    Affects Patrician  1  Chance  80
;------------------------------------------

          and Trait Patrician > 0

    Affects Brutal  2  Chance  25
    Affects Wealthy  2  Chance  80
    Affects Wealthy  1  Chance  40
    Affects Wealthy  1  Chance  20

;-------------------------------------------
; Assign gens and cognomen to patrician marriage suitors
;
; RandomPercent values are assigned assuming the order of these
; triggers doesn't change. New triggers must be added at the top
; and the RandomPercent value must be 1/N * 100, where N is the
; total number of triggers.
;
; Possible Patrician Names: 39
;-------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
; Assign natal gens and cognomen to patrician candidates for adoption
;
; RandomPercent values are assigned assuming the order of these
; triggers doesn't change. New triggers must be added at the top
; and the RandomPercent value must be 1/N * 100, where N is the
; total number of triggers.
;
; Possible Patrician Names: 39
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
; Assign natal gens and cognomen to plebeian lesser generals who are
; candidates for adoption.
;
; RandomPercent values are assigned assuming the order of these
; triggers doesn't change. New triggers must be added at the top
; and the RandomPercent value must be 1/N * 100, where N is the
; total number of triggers.
;
; Possible Plebeian Names: 39
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
; ROMAN ADOPTION CHANGES IN NAMES AND STATUS
;------------------------------------------
; Give the roman adoptee the status, gens and cognomen of his adoptive family and remove the adoptive character's family name trait.
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Roman_Adopted_Into_Family_ValerivsFlaccvs
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType f_rome
          and Trait JustMarried < 1
          and Trait JustAdopted = 1
          and FatherTrait ValerivsFlaccvs > 0

    Affects Patrician  2  Chance  100
    Affects RemRomanFamilyName  1  Chance  100
    Affects GensValeria  1  Chance  100
    Affects ValerivsFlaccvs  1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger BaktriaIndos_OfferedForAdoption
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

    Condition FactionType f_baktria
          and Trait EthnoDetermined < 1
          and I_SettlementOwner sett_144 = f_baktria    ;region Gandhara settlement Taksashila
          and RandomPercent < 17

    Affects BaktriaIndos  1  Chance  100
    Affects EthnoDetermined  1  Chance  100
    Affects GoodInfantryGeneral  2  Chance  60
    Affects Just  2  Chance  60
    Affects Pious  2  Chance  60
    Affects Lenient  2  Chance  60
    Affects Xenophilia  2  Chance  80

Trigger Iuernoi
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral

Trigger LusitaniArevaci_CharacterComesOfAge
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

          and FatherTrait LusitaniArevaci > 0
          and Trait EthnoDetermined < 1
          and Trait ClientRuler < 1

    Affects LusitaniArevaci  1  Chance  100
    Affects EthnoDetermined  1  Chance  100

    Affects GoodTactician  2  Chance  80

; Section 3.1 - Secondary Triggers - HIDDEN BATTLE MECHANICS
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
; Phase 1 - Reset Last Battle Results
; Phase 2 - Set New Battle Results
; Phase 3 - Determine Whether General Learned (Energy-Based)
; Phase 4 - Increase Odds for Gaining Initial Star
; Phase 5 - Determine Whether Energetic General Learned Tactics/Leadership
; Phase 6 - Determine Whether General Learned Upon Reflection
; Phase 7 - Determine Whether General Learned Through Persistence

;------------------------------------------
; Phase 0 - Spoils of Victory - Large Battle Counter
;------------------------------------------
;
;SMALL UNIT SIZE
;

Trigger AS01a_Battle_Victory_Small
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WasAttacker
          and WonBattle
          and I_EventCounter ecUnitScale = 1
          and NumFriendsInBattle > 80
          and NumFriendsInBattle <= 216
          and BattleOdds < 0.3
          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 20

    Affects EnemyCampCaptured  1  Chance  100
    Affects BigBattleCounter  1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger SMa_Spoils_Manager_spoils
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait EnemyCampCaptured > 0
          and Trait NaturalCharisma > 3
          and Trait Selflessness < 3

    Affects SpoilsManager  24  Chance  75
;------------------------------------------

    Condition Trait EnemyCampCaptured > 0
          and Trait NaturalCharisma > 3
          and Trait Selflessness < 3
          and Trait Impoverished < 1

    Affects Wealthy  1  Chance  75
;------------------------------------------

          and Trait NaturalCharisma > 3
          and Trait Selflessness < 3
          and Trait Impoverished > 0

    Affects Impoverished  -1  Chance  75

          and not WonBattle
          and Trait GoodLeader < 1

    Affects BadLeader  1  Chance  100
    Affects BadLeader  1  Chance  40

          and not WonBattle

Trigger Infantry_Commander_Victory_good
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and Trait BattlePoints > 3
          and PercentageUnitCategory infantry > 80
          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 20
          and Trait BadInfantryGeneral < 1

    Affects GoodInfantryGeneral  1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Infantry_Commander_Victory_bad
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and Trait BattlePoints > 3
          and PercentageUnitCategory infantry > 80
          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 20
          and Trait BadInfantryGeneral > 0

    Affects BadInfantryGeneral  -1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Infantry_Commander_Defeat_good
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and PercentageUnitCategory infantry > 80
          and Trait GoodInfantryGeneral > 0

    Affects GoodInfantryGeneral  -1  Chance  100
    Affects GoodInfantryGeneral  -1  Chance  50

          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and not BattleOdds < 0.5

          and not FactionType f_rome
          and Trait FearsRomans < 1

Trigger Philhellene1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= polis_one
          and not CultureType cul_1
          and not CultureType cul_3
          and not CultureType cul_5
          and GovernorLoyaltyLevel > loyalty_disillusioned
          and Trait Philhellene < 1
          and Trait PlainRomanVirtue < 1
          and Trait HatesGreeks < 1

    Affects Philhellene  1  Chance  20
;------------------------------------------

    Affects HatesGreeks  1  Chance  20

Trigger MishellenicRoman
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition FactionType f_rome
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= polis_one
          and Trait Philhellene < 1
          and Trait PlainRomanVirtue > 1

    Affects HatesGreeks  1  Chance  10
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement

          and Trait Scholarly > 0
          and Trait Philhellene < 1
          and Trait PlainRomanVirtue < 1
          and Trait HatesGreeks < 1

    Affects Philhellene  1  Chance  10
;------------------------------------------

; Section 4.3 - Faction Specific Triggers - HELLENIC
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Trigger HellenicLeaderBecomesBasileus
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

    Condition not CultureType cul_2
          and not CultureType cul_4
          and not CultureType cul_5
          and not CultureType cul_6
          and not CultureType cul_7
          and not FactionType f_baktria
          and not FactionType f_kh
          and not FactionType f_pergamon

    Affects Basileus  2  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger HellenicLeaderIsBasileus
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and not CultureType cul_2
          and not CultureType cul_4
          and not CultureType cul_5
          and not CultureType cul_6
          and not CultureType cul_7
          and not FactionType f_baktria
          and not FactionType f_kh
          and not FactionType f_pergamon
          and Trait Basileus < 1

    Affects Basileus  1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger HellenicHeirBecomesKleronomos
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

    Condition not CultureType cul_2
          and not CultureType cul_4
          and not CultureType cul_5
          and not CultureType cul_6
          and not CultureType cul_7
          and not FactionType f_baktria
          and not FactionType f_kh
          and not FactionType f_pergamon

    Affects KleronomosBasileios  1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger HellenicHeirIsKleronomos
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsFactionHeir
          and Trait KleronomosBasileios < 1
          and not CultureType cul_2
          and not CultureType cul_4
          and not CultureType cul_5
          and not CultureType cul_6
          and not CultureType cul_7
          and not FactionType f_baktria
          and not FactionType f_kh
          and not FactionType f_pergamon

    Affects KleronomosBasileios  1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger HellenicHeirCeasesKleronomos
    WhenToTest CeasedFactionHeir

    Condition not CultureType cul_2
          and not CultureType cul_4
          and not CultureType cul_5
          and not CultureType cul_6
          and not CultureType cul_7
          and not FactionType f_baktria
          and not FactionType f_kh
          and not FactionType f_pergamon

    Affects ExKleronomosBasileios  1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger HellenicHeirCeasesKleronomos2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and not CultureType cul_2
          and not CultureType cul_4
          and not CultureType cul_5
          and not CultureType cul_6
          and not CultureType cul_7

    Affects KleronomosBasileios  -1  Chance  100

; Spartan Agoge Triggers

Trigger Spartan_Agoge_Begins
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition CharacterIsLocal
          and SettlementName sett_090    ; Sparte
          and Trait SpartanAgoge < 1
          and CharacterAge > 24
          and CharacterAge < 19

    Affects SpartanAgoge  1  Chance  100
    Affects SpartanTraining  1  Chance  100
    Affects AgogeProgressCounter  1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Spartan_Failed_Spartan_Agoge_1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not EndedInSettlement
          and Trait SpartanAgoge = 1
          and Trait Spartiates > 0

    Affects SpartanAgoge  1  Chance  100
    Affects SpartanTraining  -1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Spartan_Failed_Spartan_Agoge_2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition not SettlementName sett_090    ; Sparte
          and Trait SpartanAgoge = 1
          and Trait Spartiates > 0

    Affects SpartanAgoge  1  Chance  100
    Affects SpartanTraining  -1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Failed_Spartan_Agoge_1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not EndedInSettlement
          and Trait SpartanAgoge = 1
          and Trait Spartiates < 1

    Affects SpartanAgoge  2  Chance  100
    Affects SpartanTraining  -1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Failed_Spartan_Agoge_2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition not SettlementName sett_090    ; Sparte
          and Trait SpartanAgoge = 1
          and Trait Spartiates < 1

    Affects SpartanAgoge  2  Chance  100
    Affects SpartanTraining  -1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Finished_Agoge_Barely
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition SettlementName sett_090    ; Sparte
          and Trait SpartanAgoge = 1
          and Trait AgogeProgressCounter = 2
          and Trait NaturalEnergy < 3

    Affects SpartanAgoge  3  Chance  100
    Affects SpartanTraining  -1  Chance  100
    Affects AgogeProgressCounter  -8  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Finished_Agoge_Excelled
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition SettlementName sett_090    ; Sparte
          and Trait SpartanAgoge = 1
          and Trait AgogeProgressCounter = 2
          and Trait NaturalIntelligence > 3
          and Trait NaturalCharisma > 3
          and Trait NaturalEnergy > 3

    Affects SpartanAgoge  5  Chance  100
    Affects SpartanTraining  -1  Chance  100
    Affects AgogeProgressCounter  -8  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Finished_Agoge_Normal
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition SettlementName sett_090    ; Sparte
          and Trait SpartanAgoge = 1
          and Trait AgogeProgressCounter = 2

    Affects SpartanAgoge  4  Chance  100
    Affects SpartanTraining  -1  Chance  100
    Affects AgogeProgressCounter  -8  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Spartan_Agoge_Progress
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition SettlementName sett_090    ; Sparte
          and Trait SpartanAgoge = 1

    Affects AgogeProgressCounter  1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Finished_Spartan_Agoge_Starts_Krypteia
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition CharacterIsLocal
          and CharacterAge < 21
          and Trait SpartanAgoge > 4
          and Trait Spartiates > 0
          and Trait AgogeKrypteia < 1
          and Trait AgogePaidiskos < 1
          and IsRegionOneOf 164
          and Trait NaturalEnergy > 2
          and Trait NaturalIntelligence > 2
          and Trait LoyaltyLevel > 3
          and RandomPercent > 75

    Affects AgogeKrypteia  1  Chance  100
    Affects SpartanTraining  1  Chance  100
    Affects AgogeProgressCounter  1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Failed_Krypteia_inside
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and Trait AgogeKrypteia = 1

    Affects AgogeKrypteia  1  Chance  100
    Affects SpartanTraining  -1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Failed_Krypteia_outside
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not IsRegionOneOf 164
          and Trait AgogeKrypteia = 1

    Affects AgogeKrypteia  1  Chance  100
    Affects SpartanTraining  -1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Finished_Krypteia
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsRegionOneOf 164
          and Trait AgogeKrypteia = 1
          and Trait AgogeProgressCounter = 2

    Affects AgogeKrypteia  2  Chance  100
    Affects SpartanTraining  -1  Chance  100
    Affects AgogeProgressCounter  -8  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Spartan_Krypteia_Progress
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsRegionOneOf 164
          and Trait AgogeKrypteia = 1

    Affects AgogeProgressCounter  1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Finished_Spartan_Agoge_Starts_Paidiskos
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

          and CharacterAge < 21
          and Trait SpartanAgoge > 4
          and Trait AgogeKrypteia < 1

    Affects SpartanTraining  1  Chance  100

Trigger greek_strategos
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition not FactionType f_seleukid    ;;; Seleukid Strategos = Satrap and specific triggers are developed for these.
          and Attribute Piety > 5
          and Attribute Command > 2
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and not IsUnderSiege
          and RemainingMPPercentage > 85
          and Trait VictorOthersVirtue > 0
          and Trait InOffice < 1
          and Trait Hellenic = 1

    Affects Strategos  1  Chance  25
;------------------------------------------

Trigger greek_Proxenos
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition Attribute Piety > 2
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and not IsUnderSiege
          and RemainingMPPercentage > 85
          and Trait SpartanTraining < 1
          and Trait Xenophilia > 0
          and Trait Hellenic = 1
          and Trait Proxenos < 1
          and Trait ProxenosBad < 1

    Affects Proxenos  1  Chance  25
;------------------------------------------

Trigger greek_Proxenos_relations_turn_sour
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsGeneral
          and OnAWarFooting
          and Trait Proxenos > 0

    Affects ProxenosBad  2  Chance  3
;------------------------------------------

Trigger greek_Proxenos_relations_turn_good_again
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not OnAWarFooting
          and Trait ProxenosBad > 0

    Affects Proxenos  2  Chance  9
;------------------------------------------

Trigger greek_Hieropoios_battle_temple
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition not IsFactionLeader
          and not IsFactionHeir
          and not IsUnderSiege
          and RemainingMPPercentage > 85
          and Trait Pious > 0
          and Trait Hellenic = 1
          and Trait Hieropoios < 1
          and Trait InOffice < 1
          and SettlementBuildingExists > temple_of_battle_L1

    Affects Hieropoios  1  Chance  5
;------------------------------------------

Trigger CeltTrio
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition Trait Celtic > 0
          and not FactionType f_arevaci
          and not FactionType f_lusotannan
          and not FactionType f_casse
          and Trait CeltTrio < 1
          and Trait ClientRuler < 1
          and AgentType = named character

    Affects CeltTrio  1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Celtic_becomes_Bardos
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition Trait Celtic > 0
          and not FactionType f_arevaci
          and not FactionType f_lusotannan
          and TimeInRegion > 2
          and RemainingMPPercentage > 85
          and SettlementBuildingExists > market_two
          and Trait NaturalCharisma > 2
          and Trait NaturalIntelligence > 2
          and Trait Ignorance < 1
          and Trait BadPoet < 1

    Affects Bardos  1  Chance  8
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Celtic_becomes_BardosRoute
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition Trait Celtic > 0
          and not FactionType f_arevaci
          and not FactionType f_lusotannan
          and TimeInRegion > 2
          and RemainingMPPercentage > 85
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= route
          and Trait NaturalCharisma > 2
          and Trait NaturalIntelligence > 2
          and Trait Ignorance < 1
          and Trait ClientRuler < 1
          and Trait BadPoet < 1

    Affects Bardos  1  Chance  5
;------------------------------------------

Trigger celt_is_Uergobret
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and FactionType f_aedui
          and Trait Uergobret < 1
          and Trait Celtic > 0
          and Trait ClientRuler < 1

    Affects Uergobret  1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Becomes_Uergobret
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

    Condition FactionType f_aedui
          and Trait Celtic > 0
          and Trait ClientRuler < 1

    Affects Uergobret  1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

          and Trait ExRemos = 1

          and Trait ClientRuler < 1

; Mod EBII - VTM - Trait to reduce faction leaders Authority to support Celtic government mechanism that reduces Authority as the Confederacy expands

Trigger AeduiAlignConfPlusOne
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition FactionType f_aedui
          and IsFactionLeader
          and CharacterIsLocal    ;;; limit the effects to player's faction only
          and Attribute Authority > 0    ;;; backup condition prepared to prevent overflow of Authority into negative
          and I_EventCounter ecAeduiConfederates = 1
          and Trait Confederates < 1
          and AgentType = family

    Affects Confederates  1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and FactionType f_arverni
          and Trait Uerrixs < 1
          and Trait Celtic > 0
          and Trait ClientRuler < 1

    Affects Uerrixs  1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger celt_is_tigernos
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and FactionType f_casse

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition FactionType f_casse
          and IsFactionLeader
          and CharacterIsLocal    ;;; limit the effects to player's faction only
          and I_EventCounter ecCasseKing = 1
          and Attribute Authority > 0    ;;; backup condition prepared to prevent overflow of Authority into negative
          and Trait Confederates < 1

    Affects Confederates  1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger IberianHand1
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess > clear
          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 35
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and BattleOdds > 0.9
          and FactionType f_arevaci
          and Trait Lenient < 1
          and Trait IberianHand < 1
          and Trait AreuakoiAmmGader < 1
          and Trait AreuakoiEmporites < 1

    Affects IberianHand  2  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger celt_is_coropoto_arimo
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and FactionType f_lusotannan
          and Trait CoropotoArimo < 1
          and Trait Celtic > 0
          and Trait ClientRuler < 1

    Affects CoropotoArimo  1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger becomes_coropoto_arimo
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

    Condition FactionType f_lusotannan
          and Trait Celtic > 0
          and Trait ClientRuler < 1

    Affects CoropotoArimo  1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger reinherited_orbo_ueldo
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

    Condition FactionType f_lusotannan
          and Trait ExOrboUeldo = 1
          and Trait Celtic > 0
          and Trait ClientRuler < 1

    Affects OrboUeldo  2  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger inherited_orbo_ueldo
    WhenToTest CeasedFactionHeir

    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and FactionType f_lusotannan
          and Trait Celtic > 0
          and Trait ClientRuler < 1

    Affects ExOrboUeldo  1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger celt_is_heir_orbo_ueldo
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsFactionHeir
          and FactionType f_lusotannan
          and AgentType = family
          and Trait OrboUeldo < 1
          and Trait Celtic > 0
          and Trait ClientRuler < 1

    Affects OrboUeldo  1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

    Condition FactionType f_lusotannan
          and Trait Celtic > 0

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and FactionType f_arevaci
          and Trait Touezakos < 1
          and Trait Celtic > 0
          and Trait ClientRuler < 1

    Affects Touezakos  1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

          and Trait ClientRuler < 1

          and IsGeneral
          and not IsUnderSiege

    Affects Wealthy  -8  Chance  100

Trigger ArevaciAlignConfPlusOne
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition FactionType f_arevaci
          and IsFactionLeader
          and CharacterIsLocal    ;;; limit the effects to player's faction only
          and Attribute Authority > 1    ;;; condition to prevent overflow of Authority into negative
          and I_EventCounter ecArevaciConfederates = 1
          and Trait Confederates < 1

    Affects Confederates  1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

;------------------------------------------
; Pastoralist/Dweller Triggers
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Sweboz_Governor_Dweller
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition FactionType f_sweboz
          and SettlementBuildingExists > wooden_pallisade
          and TimeInRegion > 40
          and Trait Buraz < 1
          and Trait CovetsSouthernOpulence < 1
          and Trait SwebozRaider < 1
          and Trait NaturalEnergy < 5

    Affects Buraz  1  Chance  100
    Affects Hirdijaz  -1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Sweboz_Governor_Build_NomFarms
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

    Condition FactionType f_sweboz
          and SettlementBuildingFinished > nomfarms_two
          and TimeInRegion > 3
          and Trait Buraz < 1
          and Trait HillBilly < 3
          and Trait SwebozRaider < 1
          and Trait CovetsSouthernOpulence < 1

    Affects Buraz  1  Chance  100
    Affects Hirdijaz  -1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

    Condition FactionType f_sweboz
          and SettlementBuildingFinished > farms_one
          and TimeInRegion > 3
          and Trait Buraz < 1
          and Trait HillBilly < 3
          and Trait SwebozRaider < 1
          and Trait CovetsSouthernOpulence < 1

    Affects Buraz  1  Chance  100
    Affects Hirdijaz  -1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Sweboz_General_Pastoralist
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition FactionType f_sweboz
          and not EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage < 75
          and Trait Hirdijaz < 1
          and Trait HillBilly > 1
          and Trait Haimiskaz < 1

    Affects Hirdijaz  1  Chance  20
    Affects Buraz  -1  Chance  40
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Sweboz_Governor_herds
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

    Condition FactionType f_sweboz
          and SettlementBuildingFinished >= herds_precursor
          and not SettlementBuildingExists > wooden_pallisade
          and Trait CitySlicker < 3
          and Trait Hirdijaz < 1

    Affects Hirdijaz  1  Chance  50
    Affects Buraz  -1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait Hirdijaz > 0

    Affects Hirdijaz  1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Sweboz_dads_Buraz
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait Buraz > 0

    Affects Buraz  1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger SwebozHirdijazFallBack

    Condition FactionType f_lugia
          and not CharacterIsLocal
          and Trait NaturalEnergy > 2
          and Trait LugianWarrior > 3
          and Attribute Command > 2
          and IsFactionLeader
          and CharacterAge > 29

    Affects LugianWarrior  5  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger LugionesAlignConfPLugionesne
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition FactionType f_lugia
          and IsFactionLeader
          and CharacterIsLocal    ;;; limit the effects to player's faction only
          and Attribute Authority > 0    ;;; backup condition prepared to prevent overflow of Authority into negative
          and I_EventCounter ecLugionesDominion = 1
          and Trait Confederates < 1

    Affects Confederates  1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger LugionesAlignConfMinusOne
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition FactionType f_lugia
          and IsFactionLeader
          and CharacterIsLocal    ;;; limit the effects to player's faction only
          and I_EventCounter ecLugionesDominion = 1
          and Trait Confederates > 1

    Affects Confederates  -1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger GetaeBecomesLeader
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

    Condition FactionType f_getai
          and Trait ClientRuler < 1

    Affects Razas  1  Chance  100
;--------------------------------------------

Trigger GetaeIsLeader
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and FactionType f_getai
          and Trait Razas < 1
          and Trait ClientRuler < 1

    Affects Razas  1  Chance  100
;--------------------------------------------

    Condition FactionType f_getai
          and Trait ClientRuler < 1

          and Trait ClientRuler < 1

Trigger WhealthInherited_1
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FactionType f_carthage
          and FatherTrait Wealthy > 0
          and FatherTrait Wealthy < 3
          and Trait Wealthy < 1

    Affects Wealthy  4  Chance  100

    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and FactionType f_numidia
          and Trait MelekMashliyim < 1
          and Trait ClientRuler < 1

    Affects MelekMashliyim  1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

          and Trait ClientRuler < 1

;------------------------------------------
; Assign family name traits to Roman diplomats

; RandomPercent values are assigned assuming the order of these
; triggers doesn't change. Each new trigger must be added at the
; top and the RandomPercent value must be 1/N * 100, where N is
; the total number of triggers.
;------------------------------------------

    Condition FactionType f_rome
          and AgentType = diplomat
          and Trait FamilyNameGiven = 0
          and RandomPercent < 3

    Affects ValerivsFlaccvs  1  Chance  100

Trigger character_spends_time_at_average_battle_temple
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEndInSettlement

    Condition RemainingMPPercentage > 95
          and Trait Coward < 1
          and Trait Haemophobic < 1
          and Trait Hypochondriac < 1
          and Trait BattleWeary < 1
          and Trait Bored < 1
          and Trait Sacrilegious < 2
          and Trait PublicAtheism < 2
          and SettlementBuildingExists < temple_of_battle_L3

    Affects PublicFaith  1  Chance  2
    Affects Feck  1  Chance  2
    Affects Superstitious  1  Chance  1
;------------------------------------------

    Condition RemainingMPPercentage > 95
          and Trait PublicFaith < 2

          and Trait Selflessness < 3

          and TimeInRegion > 19

    Affects GoodTrader  1  Chance  1
    Affects PublicFaith  -1  Chance  10
    Affects Pious  -1  Chance  30

; Section 9.0 - Game Mechanics Triggers
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Trigger ApplySiegeSlowdownSmall
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsGeneral
          and CharacterIsLocal
          and Trait SiegeSlowdown < 1
          and FactionType f_rome    ;;; Romans as famous besiegers get the smallest penalty

    Affects SiegeSlowdown  1  Chance  100

Trigger ApplySiegeSlowdownLarge
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsGeneral
          and CharacterIsLocal
          and Trait SiegeSlowdown < 1
          and not FactionType f_rome    ;;; Barbarian and nomadic factions get the largest penalty...
          and not FactionType f_aedui
          and not FactionType f_arverni
          and not FactionType f_casse
          and not FactionType f_lusotannan
          and not FactionType f_sweboz
          and not FactionType f_getai
          and not FactionType f_saka
          and not FactionType f_sauromatae
          and not FactionType f_lugia
          and not FactionType f_arevaci
          and not FactionType f_boii

    Affects SiegeSlowdown  3  Chance  100

Trigger ApplySiegeSlowdownMedium
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition IsGeneral
          and CharacterIsLocal
          and Trait SiegeSlowdown < 1    ;;; ...and the rest gets the medium one

    Affects SiegeSlowdown  2  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
; Section 9.1 - Game Mechanics triggers - ROYAL FAMILY
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Trigger FinallyBecomesFactionLeader
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

    Affects Factionleader  1  Chance  100
    Affects RoyalFamily  4  Chance  100
    Affects Factionheir  -1  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger NewLeaderRewardedForVictories_1
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

    Condition Trait BigBattleCounter > 0

    Affects Factionleader  10  Chance  100
;------------------------------------------

Trigger NewLeaderRewardedForVictories_2
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

    Condition Trait BigBattleCounter > 1
          and Attribute Authority < 10    ;;; condition to prevent authority overflow over max value of 10

    Affects Factionleader  10  Chance  100
    Affects AddAuthorityLevel  1  Chance  50
;------------------------------------------

Trigger NewLeaderRewardedForVictories_3
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

    Condition Trait BigBattleCounter > 2
          and Attribute Authority < 10    ;;; condition to prevent authority overflow over max value of 10

    Affects Factionleader  10  Chance  100
    Affects AddAuthorityLevel  1  Chance  50
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

          and Trait Factionleader < 1

    Affects Factionheir  -1  Chance  100

Trigger RespectFromCommandPlus
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and Attribute Command < 5
          and FactionLeaderAttribute Command > 5
          and Trait CommandLoyaltyModifier < 1
          and Trait LoyaltyLevel > 2

    Affects CommandLoyaltyModifier  1  Chance  5
;------------------------------------------

Trigger RespectFromCommandMinus
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and Attribute Command < 5
          and FactionLeaderAttribute Command > 5
          and Trait CommandLoyaltyModifier = 2
          and Trait LoyaltyLevel > 2

    Affects CommandLoyaltyModifier  -1  Chance  5
;------------------------------------------

Trigger AmbitionFromCommand
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and Attribute Command > 5
          and FactionLeaderAttribute Command < 5
          and Trait CommandLoyaltyModifier < 2
          and Trait LoyaltyLevel < 5

    Affects CommandLoyaltyModifier  2  Chance  5
;------------------------------------------

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not FactionType f_rome
          and DistanceCapital < 10
          and not IsFactionLeader

Trigger ClientIntrique
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

    Condition Trait ClientRuler > 0
          and Attribute Loyalty > 0
          and NumBuildingsCompletedFaction alliedstate > 3    ;;; The more allies one has, the more difficult it is to keep them in line
          and Trait ClientLoyaltyModifier < 1    ;;; This is supposed to be a hidden mechanic, please do not publish this on public fora/guides

    Affects ClientLoyaltyModifier  1  Chance  50
;------------------------------------------

Trigger ClientDisloyalty
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

    Condition Trait ClientRuler > 0
          and Attribute Loyalty > 0
          and NumBuildingsCompletedFaction alliedstate > 7    ;;; The more allies one has, the more difficult it is to keep them in line
          and Trait ClientLoyaltyModifier < 1    ;;; This is supposed to be a hidden mechanic, please do not publish this on public fora/guides

    Affects ClientLoyaltyModifier  1  Chance  50
